channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 14:24 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 🔴 14:24 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!#Pokrovskaya_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
